size: 2.5 kg, 3 kg, 4 kg dumbbell pairs (total 19 kg including all six dumbbells)
count: 6 dumbbells (2 of 2.5 kg, 2 of 3 kg, 2 of 4 kg) and 1 rack/stand
material: cast iron dumbbells with neoprene coating and plastic rack/stand
usage: Strength training and fitness workouts at home or in classes, including exercises like curls, presses, and general toning, with organized storage on the included rack.

Printed weight number on each end cap

Ideal for fitness classes or at-home workout routine
Includes 6 cast iron neoprene-coated dumbbells in 3 weight categories with a storage stand
ai_description: Compact KAKSS dumbbell set featuring three color-coded pairs of hexagonal neoprene weights on a black A-frame stand. Green 2.5 kg, orange 3 kg, and purple 4 kg dumbbells display clear weight markings and logos, with a molded plastic rack cradling each pair securely.
target_audience: Home fitness users, beginners to intermediate exercisers, and people attending or running fitness classes who need a compact, color-coded dumbbell set with stand.
product_name: KAKSS Supreme Quality Neoprene Dumbbell With Stand 19Kg (2.5kg+3kg+4kg N Pair)
